title: You have exceeded the maximum number of transactions allowed. Please try again later.
body: So i want to buy project zed skin so i wanted to use mobile payment but it says You have exceeded the maximum number of transactions allowed. Please try again later. I waited 3 days and nothing has happened plz halp as soon as possible thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you're going to have to [contact support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), normally the wait time is only 24 hours however there may be an issue with your account.

Player Support will be able to unlock any holds currently active on your account (if required)
Too bad you can't even sign in to send a support ticket. Have fun bumping into SSL Error and ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED walls.

Hey there,

I'm currently able to sign in and browse the support site with no issues, be sure you're accessing the [correct site ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).

I see another user already suggested you reset your Internet explorer settings, did this not help?
Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).

Hey there,

You sound like a rioter. I was wondering if you are a rioter or just
a very helpful community member.

Just a friendly community volunteer, perhaps one day though.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thanks but I've already tried those solutions. I've spent more than 4 hours straight trying out various solutions. One worked for me.

The issue I had is actually linked to the ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED problem.

The fix I've found (after trying many popular solutions) is to disable your TCP/IPv6. That fixed it for me. I can sign in the support site and the Lunar Revel Shop button appeared for me.

Perhaps you could spread this possible solution to those you saw having the similar problems. Thanks.
